name: AGD 2022: Project "Sandstorm"
description:
Project Brief

The AGD project is a yearly collaboration between Master and Bachelor students at KADK. The goal of the project is for the students to practice working together on a cohesive project, with a focus primarily on the artistic side of the project. (Including  gameplay is allowed however.)

Project Sandstorm

The project takes place on a tidally locked planet: One side always in the light and hot and one side always in the dark and cold, with a temperate belt right in the middle. The environment in this project is on the hot side, where people hide in canyons from the sand and sun, projected by giant structures called "Jellyfish" who circulate air, provide space for plants to grow and shield the city from sandstorms. But this city's Jellyfish stopped working and the citizens abandoned the city: A lone engineer returns to try to restore the Jellyfish.
